name: fect - 2D Cyberpunk Arcade Game
description:
In this 2D cyberpunk arcade adventure, you play the part of an infected individual who has to spread his disease through the city's netphones to survive. Cleanse yourself, or die trying!

Controls:

WASD + E (To Interact)
Point & Click in Menus

Credits: 

Team Fectatoes

Nathaniel Onandia - Environment Pixel Artist & Designer
Brian Wang - Character Pixel Artist, Designer
